title: Agreement between the United Arab Emirates and Sri Lanka for the Establishment of a Joint Commission
decision_details: ? the proposal made by Hon. (Prof.) G.L. Peiris, Minister of External Affairs, to sign the above agreement between the Government of Sri Lanka and the Government of the United Arab Emirates for the establishment of a Joint Commission between the two countries for the purpose of promoting co-operation in various fields and strengthening existing bilateral relations, was approved by the Cabinet.
